snippet: Helped by its powerful trading business, the firm's revenue more than doubled in the third quarter, to $8.35 billion, exceeding the estimates of Wall Street analysts.
abstract: Helped by its powerful trading business, the firm's revenue more than doubled in the third quarter, to $8.35 billion, exceeding the estimates of Wall Street analysts.

headline.main: Private Equity Gains Helped Lift Revenue in Goldman's 3rd Quarter
headline.print_headline: Private Equity Gains Helped Lift Revenue in Goldman’s 3rd Quarter
